programme.title: Twister
programme.desc: Storm-chasers (Helen Hunt, Bill Paxton) finalizing their divorce try to place equipment inside a tornado on the Oklahoma plains.

programme.title: Walking Tall
programme.desc: When Chris Vaughn returns to his hometown to find work, he finds that the lumber mill has closed and the town's big business is now a casino. Aided by his friend Ray Templeton, Vaughn tries to make a stand against the area's crime and corruption.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The beating of a young man uncovers a dangerous male escort service where the boss may have reasons for sending her staff on potentially deadly dates.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The details of a kidnapping are similar to a series of rapes and murders that may link the crime to a serial killer.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When the detectives investigate the death of a Romanian immigrant, suspicions surface that she is alive and masquerading as her twin.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: Harry and Heather reunite, but their relationship is more complicated than ever.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler encounter problems when the prime suspect in a sexual assault cannot be identified by the shaken victim.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler and Beck (Connie Nielsen) try to get a young prostitute to testify against her pimp (Michael Kenneth Williams) after a trio of murder victims with matching tattoos leads them to a teenage prostitution ring.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A troubled teen (David Del Rio) is the first suspect when a money manager is found murdered in his loft, but a hidden video camera leads detectives to a star football player whose agent is willing to do almost anything to protect his client.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The investigation into the stabbing death of a family man leads Benson and Stabler to believe he had an illicit hobby; the detectives meet a woman and her jealous boyfriend while undercover at a swingers club.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When the detectives investigate the sexual assault of the executive of a private military-contract company, they discover a larger conspiracy in Iraq.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Executive ADA Haden must cut their romantic weekend short to investigate the disappearance of an underage prostitute, who seems to be one in a series of escorts who went missing after advertising on a newspaper's website.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: After a single mom is arrested for leaving her young daughter alone for days, Sgt. Benson suspects the woman may have been abused in her own childhood.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: After being found unconscious in her hotel bathroom, an Atlanta detective -- in town for a law-enforcement conference -- says that she was raped; Rollins discovers a personal connection to the suspect.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An online pedophile ring -- including two high-profile suspects -- is targeted in an undercover sting.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An investigation into the sexual exploitation of Catholic schoolgirls results in charges against judges, legislators, DAs and members of the police department.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The team works to unravel a sex trafficking operation with ties to government offices, the police department and the Catholic church after one of their own is implicated in a cover-up.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A doctor arrested for sexually abusing his patients is set free after Cassidy's testimony causes a mistrial.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and the team investigate the death of a prostitute at a brothel; they wonder if there was foul play or if this could be a case of a junkie who relapsed, turned to tricking, got depressed and committed suicide.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Amaro asks the SVU for help in clearing a convicted man's name and brings a figure from Benson's past back into her life.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Carisi's niece helps a friend report a sexual assault; Benson investigates a college's secret society that preys on female students.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Rollins investigates an assault by a masked man at an underground party; Benson uncovers a suspect who may be valuable as a witness.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A runaway bride calls the SVU for help on the day of her wedding; Rollins pitches in on her day off.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A tourist is found dead with the word "guilty" written on her forehead; Detective Munch is forced to ask his ex-wife (Carol Kane) for help.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler encounter problems when the prime suspect in a sexual assault cannot be identified by the shaken victim.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler and Beck (Connie Nielsen) try to get a young prostitute to testify against her pimp (Michael Kenneth Williams) after a trio of murder victims with matching tattoos leads them to a teenage prostitution ring.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The investigation into the stabbing death of a family man leads Benson and Stabler to believe he had an illicit hobby; the detectives meet a woman and her jealous boyfriend while undercover at a swingers club.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When the detectives investigate the sexual assault of the executive of a private military-contract company, they discover a larger conspiracy in Iraq.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Executive ADA Haden must cut their romantic weekend short to investigate the disappearance of an underage prostitute, who seems to be one in a series of escorts who went missing after advertising on a newspaper's website.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives investigate a series of sexual attacks happening on subways; Benson begins dating a crime reporter.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Munch bonds with a television news reporter (Jennifer Esposito) who was sexually assaulted months earlier.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A sexual assault victim (guest star Tracy Pollan) helps detectives investigate the activities of a rape suspect (guest star Neil Maffin).

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The question of patients' rights surfaces when a mentally ill man electing not to take his medication is a suspect in the stabbing death of psychiatric doctoral student.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An investigation into an alleged date-rape involving GHB on a college campus is discouraged by members of the administration and students at the school.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A case involving the rape and murder of a teacher hits a snag after the woman's illicit sexual history is exposed.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Three people, unconnected except to cases that Detective Benson investigated, are found ritualistically murdered.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Tutuola becomes personally involved in a case, when a friend's daughter becomes a fatal victim of sexual assault.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An estranged son and a former patient are the prime suspects in the murder of a prominent doctor and the rape of his wife.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler enter the world of pornography when they investigate the shooting and rape of an Arkansas man.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives believe a young Asian's assault has something to do with a rivalry between gangs, until a second victim turns up.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When the squad tries to solve an assault in Central Park, they are hampered by their own blind spots and a community that is losing trust in the police.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU questions a group of college roommates when one of them goes missing during COVID-19 lockdown.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU investigates when a role-play session on a camming website turns violent after one user decides to meet his idol in person.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Carisi takes on a powerful judge when he inexplicably dismisses the rape case of a university student.

programme.title: Reframe the Game
programme.desc: This is the story of the rise of top-flight Women's rugby. We uncover the untold struggles, relentless passion, and game-changing moments that built the Women's club level game.

programme.title: Australia Championship Supercars
programme.desc: Repco Supercars Championship highlights from the Betr Darwin Triple Crown.

programme.title: Australia Championship Supercars
programme.desc: Repco Supercars Championship highlights from the Betr Darwin Triple Crown.

programme.title: Premiership Rugby
programme.desc: We revisit the best tries of the 2024/25 Gallagher Premiership Rugby season, including Tom Roebuck, Kalaveti Ravouvou, Cadan Murley and many others.

programme.title: Premiership Rugby
programme.desc: A look back at the story of the 2024/25 Gallagher Premiership Rugby season, as Bath claimed the title for the first time since 1996.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Classics
programme.desc: We revisit the 1993 final between Marseille and AC Milan at Munich's Olympiastadion. The occasion was later overshadowed by one of the biggest scandals in the sport's history.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Classics
programme.desc: A look back at the extraordinary 1994 final at the Olympic Stadium in Athens between Fabio Capello's AC Milan and Barcelona, managed by Johan Cruyff and dubbed the 'Dream Team'.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Classics
programme.desc: We revisit the 1995 final in Vienna between Louis van Gaal's Ajax and AC Milan. A star-studded Ajax team featured Edwin van der Sar, Ronald and Frank de Boer and Edgar Davids.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Classics
programme.desc: We revisit the 1996 final between Ajax and Juventus in Rome. Juve's talented side included Didier Deschamps, Antonio Conte and Gianluca Vialli - all at the height of their powers.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Classics
programme.desc: We revisit the 1996/97 UEFA Champions League final between Borussia Dortmund and Juventus in Munich. Armed with an expensively assembled squad, Juve were overwhelming favourites.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Classics
programme.desc: Real Madrid went in search of their seventh European Cup title when they faced Juventus in the 1998 final in Amsterdam. The Serie A winners featured a 25-year-old Zinedine Zidane.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Classics
programme.desc: We revisit the extraordinary 1998/99 UEFA Champions League final between Manchester United and Bayern Munich at the Nou Camp. Victory for United would clinch an historic Treble.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Classics
programme.desc: A look back at the 1999/00 UEFA Champions League final between Real Madrid and Valencia in Paris. Steve McManaman, signed from Liverpool the previous summer, starred for Madrid.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Classics
programme.desc: We revisit the dramatic 2000/01 UEFA Champions League final between Bayern Munich and Valencia at the San Siro in Milan. Bayern were chasing their first title in a quarter-century.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Classics
programme.desc: The 2001/02 UEFA Champions League final saw a star-studded Real Madrid face Bayer Leverkusen in Glasgow. The match featured arguably the greatest goal in the competition's history.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Classics
programme.desc: We revisit the 2002/03 UEFA Champions League final between Juventus and AC Milan at Old Trafford. Paolo Maldini aimed to lift the trophy as captain, just as his father did in 1963.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Classics
programme.desc: A look back at the 2004 final between Monaco and Porto in Gelsenkirchen. Porto were led by Jose Mourinho, who would leave the club to take over at Chelsea two days after the final.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Classics
programme.desc: The 2004/05 UEFA Champions League final saw Rafa Benitez's Liverpool take on AC Milan in Istanbul. The match would go down as arguably the greatest European Cup final in history.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Classics
programme.desc: The 2005/06 UEFA Champions League final in Paris saw Arsenal face a pre-Lionel Messi Barcelona, then under the command of Frank Rijkaard, and featuring Ronaldinho in his pomp.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Classics
programme.desc: We rewind back to the 2007 final at the Olympic Stadium in Athens as AC Milan looked to avenge their humiliating defeat two years previously against Rafa Benitez's Liverpool.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Classics
programme.desc: A look back at the 2007/08 UEFA Champions League final between Manchester United and Chelsea at Moscow's Luzhniki Stadium, the first all-English final in the competition's history.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Classics
programme.desc: A look back at the 2009 UEFA Champions League final between Barcelona and Man Utd in Rome. United were bidding to become the first team to defend the trophy in the modern era.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Classics
programme.desc: We revisit the 2010 UEFA Champions League final between Bayern Munich and Inter Milan at the Bernabeu. Jose Mourinho was looking to become the third man to win it with two clubs.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Classics
programme.desc: The 2010/11 UEFA Champions League final saw Manchester United come up against Pep Guardiola's Barcelona at Wembley, the scene of United's first European Cup success back in 1968.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Classics
programme.desc: We revisit the 2011/12 UEFA Champions League final between Bayern Munich and Chelsea at the Allianz Arena. This was Chelsea's second final, having lost their last in 2008.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Classics
programme.desc: We revisit the all-German 2013 final between Borussia Dortmund and Bayern Munich at Wembley. Bayern had lost two finals in three years, including defeat on penalties to Chelsea.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Classics
programme.desc: The 2013/14 UEFA Champions League final in Lisbon saw Real Madrid go head-to-head with arch-rivals Atletico Madrid. Real aimed to become the first club to win the trophy 10 times.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Classics
programme.desc: We revisit last season's enthralling UEFA Champions League final between Juventus and Barcelona in Berlin. Barcelona were chasing their third Champions League title in six years.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Classics
programme.desc: Relive the 2015/16 Champions League final between Real Madrid and Atltico Madrid at the San Siro. Real were chasing an unprecedented 11th triumph.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Classics
programme.desc: A look back at the 2016/17 UEFA Champions League final between Juventus and Real Madrid in Cardiff. Zidane's men were hoping to clinch the title for the third time in four seasons.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Football
programme.desc: Five-time winners Liverpool hope to prevent Real Madrid from lifting their third consecutive UEFA Champions League title as the two lock horns in a mouth-watering final in Kiev.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Football
programme.desc: Relive all the action from the 2018/19 Champions League final as Tottenham met Liverpool in an all-English UEFA Champions League final in Madrid.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Football
programme.desc: Action from the UEFA Champions League final as Paris Saint-Germain and Bayern Munich meet in Lisbon, Portugal. PSG are appearing in their first ever final in this competition.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Football
programme.desc: Manchester City take on Chelsea in an all-English UEFA Champions League final at Estadio do Dragao in Portugal.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Football
programme.desc: Action from the UEFA Champions League final as Liverpool take on Real Madrid at Stade de France in Paris. The Reds are winless in their last five against the Spanish champions.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Football
programme.desc: Action from the UEFA Champions League Final as Pep Guardiola's Manchester City face Inter Milan at Ataturk Olympic Stadium in Istanbul, Turkey.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Football
programme.desc: Action from the UEFA Champions League final between Borussia Dortmund and Real Madrid at Wembley Stadium. Can Edin Terzic's Dortmund upset the odds against 14-time winners Madrid?

programme.desc: Action from Wimbledon, the third of the four tennis Grand Slams each year.

programme.desc: Cycling action from the Women's Elite Road Race in Aberystwyth, Wales.

programme.desc: A look back at Rally Greece and the latest action from the 2025 World Rally Championship.

programme.desc: The Formula One series returns to Europe as the Red Bull Ring hosts the Austrian Grand Prix. George Russell, who comes off his first victory of the season June 15 in Canada, took last year's running. Max Verstappen has a record four Austrian GP wins.

programme.title: CFL Football
programme.desc: The Roughriders (3-0) try to keep their charmed start to the season going when they host the Lions (1-2). Saskatchewan swept through the Eastern foes on its schedule, but didn't win any game by more than a touchdown. BC is 0-1 on the road in 2025.
